localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit

nodes.excerpt: Binndle is a simple app to find and share the products people use. Find out what software your peers use, or what books your idol has read, and then share your daily tools too.
nodes.title: Binndle - Find what products people use
nodes.author: PJ Manning

localize.description: Binndle是一款简单的应用，可以找到并分享人们使用的产品。找出你的同龄人用了什么软件，或者你的偶像读了什么书，然后也分享你的日常工具。
localize.tagline: 寻找人们使用的产品

localize.description: Binndle是一款簡單的應用，可以找到並分享人們使用的產品。找出你的同齡人用了什麼軟件，或者你的偶像讀了什麼書，然後也分享你的日常工具。
localize.tagline: 尋找人們使用的產品

nodes.excerpt: Playlists come and go, but mixtapes are forever. Paste in your playlist URL and it will automatically be added to the paper mixtape template. Download, print, fold, and hand out some nostalgia.
nodes.title: Send a Mixtape - Give a digital playlist on a paper crafted cassette
nodes.author: Tom Henderson

localize.description: 播放列表来来去去，但mixtape是永远的。粘贴你的播放列表URL，它将自动添加到纸质mixtape模板。下载，打印，折叠，并分发一些怀旧。
localize.tagline: 在纸制卡带上赠送一个数字播放列表。

localize.description: 播放列表來來去去，但mixtape是永遠的。粘貼你的播放列表URL，它將自動添加到紙質mixtape模板。下載，打印，摺疊，並分發一些懷舊。
localize.tagline: 在紙製卡帶上贈送一個數字播放列表。

nodes.excerpt: Community Fund is an initiative by The Product Folks to help communities with mentorship, funding, and important resources required to go from 0-1.
nodes.title: Community Fund - An early-stage accelerator to help communities grow from 0-1
nodes.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 社区基金是由The Product Folks发起的一项倡议，旨在帮助社区提供从0-1的指导、资金和所需的重要资源。
localize.tagline: 早期加速器，帮助社区从0-1成长起来

nodes.excerpt: A/B Testing and Feature Management across your React Native apps is here. Give your team the flexibility to run experiments and roll-out new features with the Taplytics React Native SDK.
nodes.title: Taplytics React Native A/B Testing - A/B Testing and Feature Management for your React Native app
nodes.author: Will Lam

localize.description: 在您的React Native应用中进行A/B测试和功能管理。通过Taplytics React Native SDK，让您的团队可以灵活地进行实验和推出新功能。
localize.tagline: 为您的React Native应用进行A/B测试和功能管理。

localize.description: 在您的React Native應用中進行A/B測試和功能管理。通過Taplytics React Native SDK，讓您的團隊可以靈活地進行實驗和推出新功能。
localize.tagline: 爲您的React Native應用進行A/B測試和功能管理。

nodes.title: 92% of all bad advice on Twitter begins w/the phrase “pro tip”
nodes.author: Ben Carlson

localize.full_text: 推特上92%的坏建议都是以 "专业建议 "开头的。
推特上92%的壞建議都是以 "專業建議 "開頭的。

nodes.excerpt: With our easy 1-step setup process, you can analyse the results of all your email marketing campaigns and truly understand which clicks are hot, which clicks are not and the areas that get the most clicks.
nodes.title: Email Heatmaps - Create heatmaps for all your email marketing campaigns
nodes.author: Taylor Drayson

localize.description: 通过我们简单的1步设置过程，您可以分析所有电子邮件营销活动的结果，并真正了解哪些点击是热门的，哪些点击不是，以及获得最多点击的领域。
localize.tagline: 为您的所有电子邮件营销活动创建热图。

localize.description: 通過我們簡單的1步設置過程，您可以分析所有電子郵件營銷活動的結果，並真正瞭解哪些點擊是熱門的，哪些點擊不是，以及獲得最多點擊的領域。
localize.tagline: 爲您的所有電子郵件營銷活動創建熱圖。

nodes.excerpt: Most users don't trust written reviews anymore. We built a platform for businesses to collect audio reviews from customers - adding an unmistakable touch of authenticity.
nodes.title: Howlr - Record audio reviews from customers.
nodes.author: Nitish Rathee

localize.description: 大多数用户已经不相信书面评论了。我们为企业搭建了一个收集客户音频评论的平台--为企业增加了一丝真实性。
localize.tagline: 记录客户的音频评论。

localize.description: 大多數用戶已經不相信書面評論了。我們爲企業搭建了一個收集客戶音頻評論的平臺--爲企業增加了一絲真實性。
localize.tagline: 記錄客戶的音頻評論。

nodes.excerpt: Based on the AI technology, we train the system to remove scratches and restore the old family photographs in one click. It is difficult to repair damaged photos without advanced PhotoShop skills. But now, you can do it like a pro with 3 steps!
nodes.title: Image Colorizer Repair - Repair old, damaged photographs and remove Scratches online
nodes.author: Samuel alex 🔥

localize.description: 基于人工智能技术，训练系统一键去除划痕，还原家庭老照片。如果没有高超的PhotoShop技术，是很难修复受损照片的。但现在，你只需3步，就能像专业人员一样完成!
localize.tagline: 修复旧的，损坏的照片和去除划痕在线。

localize.description: 基於人工智能技術，訓練系統一鍵去除劃痕，還原家庭老照片。如果沒有高超的PhotoShop技術，是很難修復受損照片的。但現在，你只需3步，就能像專業人員一樣完成!
localize.tagline: 修復舊的，損壞的照片和去除劃痕在線。

nodes.title: Bubble https://t.co/ERQI6RhQRF
nodes.author: Michael Batnick

nodes.excerpt: Aqueux is a collection of ultra high-resolution dynamic wallpapers, inspired by an OS X classic — available in several wide-gamut color editions, with easy installation on macOS, and a free set available for mobile devices.
nodes.title: Aqueux Wallpapers - A collection of dynamic wallpapers, for desktop and mobile
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: Aqueux是一个超高分辨率动态壁纸的集合，灵感来自于OS X的经典之作--有几个宽广的gamut颜色版本，可在macOS上轻松安装，并为移动设备提供免费套装。
localize.tagline: 一系列动态壁纸，适用于桌面和手机。

localize.description: Aqueux是一個超高分辨率動態壁紙的集合，靈感來自於OS X的經典之作--有幾個寬廣的gamut顏色版本，可在macOS上輕鬆安裝，併爲移動設備提供免費套裝。
localize.tagline: 一系列動態壁紙，適用於桌面和手機。

nodes.excerpt: Some rooms are just too big to engage with your Clubhouse audience. AskClubhouse is a free tool that allows your listeners to ask written questions, so you pick them and answer them live on stage.
nodes.title: AskClubhouse - Allow your Clubhouse audience to ask written questions
nodes.author: M. Brook

localize.description: 有些房间实在太大，无法与你的Clubhouse听众互动。AskClubhouse是一个免费的工具，它允许你的听众提出书面问题，所以你选择他们并在舞台上现场回答他们。
localize.tagline: 允许您的会所观众提出书面问题

localize.description: 有些房間實在太大，無法與你的Clubhouse聽衆互動。AskClubhouse是一個免費的工具，它允許你的聽衆提出書面問題，所以你選擇他們並在舞臺上現場回答他們。
localize.tagline: 允許您的會所觀衆提出書面問題

nodes.excerpt: One of life’s most enjoyable moments is finding new favorite songs, but this is often a solo experience. We analyze you and a friend's Spotify listening histories to curate a playlist full of recommended songs made just for the two of you to Discover Together.
nodes.title: Discover Together - Spotify Discover playlist curated for 2 people with AI
nodes.author: trustin

localize.description: 生活中最令人愉快的时刻之一就是寻找新的喜爱的歌曲，但这往往是一个人的体验。我们会分析你和朋友的Spotify听歌记录，为你们两个人精心策划一份播放列表，其中包含了大量的推荐歌曲，让你们一起发现。
localize.tagline: Spotify发现用AI为2人策划的播放列表。

localize.description: 生活中最令人愉快的時刻之一就是尋找新的喜愛的歌曲，但這往往是一個人的體驗。我們會分析你和朋友的Spotify聽歌記錄，爲你們兩個人精心策劃一份播放列表，其中包含了大量的推薦歌曲，讓你們一起發現。
localize.tagline: Spotify發現用AI爲2人策劃的播放列表。

nodes.excerpt: Enhance your Notion pages with automatically updating date icons for: - today - yesterday - tomorrow - last/this/next week - last/this/next quarter - last/this/next month - last/this/next year
nodes.title: Dynamic Calendar Icons for Notion - Add automatically updating date icons to your Notion

nodes.excerpt: MeetingBar shows your calendar events in the status bar. Create and join meetings with one click. ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ No data or personal information collection. The app is entirely free and powered by an open-source community. ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ Works with 30+ meeting services.
nodes.title: MeetingBar 3.0 - Meetings before your eyes
nodes.author: Andrii Leitisus

localize.description: 会议栏在状态栏中显示你的日历事件。一键创建和加入会议。无数据或个人信息收集。该应用完全免费，由开源社区提供技术支持。
localize.tagline: 眼前的会议

localize.description: 會議欄在狀態欄中顯示你的日曆事件。一鍵創建和加入會議。無數據或個人信息收集。該應用完全免費，由開源社區提供技術支持。
localize.tagline: 眼前的會議

nodes.excerpt: Remote empowers companies of all sizes to employ global teams. We take care of international payroll, benefits, taxes, and compliance, so you can focus on growing your business.
nodes.title: Remote - Remote empowers companies to employ global teams compliantly
nodes.author: Hallie Exall

localize.description: Remote使各种规模的公司都能雇佣全球团队。我们负责处理国际薪资、福利、税收和合规性问题，因此您可以专注于发展您的业务。
localize.tagline: 远程化使企业能够合规地雇佣全球团队。

localize.description: Remote使各種規模的公司都能僱傭全球團隊。我們負責處理國際薪資、福利、稅收和合規性問題，因此您可以專注於發展您的業務。
localize.tagline: 遠程化使企業能夠合規地僱傭全球團隊。

nodes.excerpt: Editable gives you the simplest way to make your videos intuitively annotated and easily marked up. Contrary to high-quality design editors like Photoshop’s paint brush or Final Cut Pro’s screen management, it just provides simple annotation experiences.
nodes.title: Editable - Annotate directly on any video files
nodes.author: Samuel alex 🔥

localize.description: Editable为你提供了一种最简单的方式，让你的视频直观地注释并轻松地标记起来。与Photoshop的画笔或Final Cut Pro的屏幕管理等高质量的设计编辑器不同，它只是提供简单的注释体验。
localize.tagline: 直接对任何视频文件进行注释

localize.description: Editable爲你提供了一種最簡單的方式，讓你的視頻直觀地註釋並輕鬆地標記起來。與Photoshop的畫筆或Final Cut Pro的屏幕管理等高質量的設計編輯器不同，它只是提供簡單的註釋體驗。
localize.tagline: 直接對任何視頻文件進行註釋

nodes.excerpt: Mirror your iPhone and iPad screen on a web browser with Replica and bring your favorite iOS apps to Mac, Windows or Linux. To celebrate this launch, the screen mirror to a web browser will be free for a limited period of time!
nodes.title: Replica 3.0 - Mirror your iOS screen on a modern web browser
nodes.author: Tiago Martinho

localize.description: 使用 Replica 将您的 iPhone 和 iPad 屏幕镜像到网络浏览器上，并将您最喜爱的 iOS 应用程序带到 Mac、Windows 或 Linux 上。为庆祝此次发布，屏幕镜像到网络浏览器将在有限的时间内免费。
localize.tagline: 在现代网络浏览器上镜像你的iOS屏幕

localize.description: 使用 Replica 將您的 iPhone 和 iPad 屏幕鏡像到網絡瀏覽器上，並將您最喜愛的 iOS 應用程序帶到 Mac、Windows 或 Linux 上。爲慶祝此次發佈，屏幕鏡像到網絡瀏覽器將在有限的時間內免費。
localize.tagline: 在現代網絡瀏覽器上鏡像你的iOS屏幕

nodes.excerpt: Share content and connect to people you love on Hive. You can express yourself with our customizable Music Section. There's featured content, trending hashtags, and a list of topics on our Explore page. You can even Repost, share, and reply to posts with Gifs.
nodes.title: Hive Social - Instagram's replacement
nodes.author: Gabe Perez

localize.description: 在Hive上分享内容并与您所爱的人建立联系。你可以通过我们可定制的音乐版块表达自己的想法。我们的探索页面上有特色内容、热门标签和主题列表。你甚至可以转发、分享和回复带有 Gifs 的帖子。
localize.tagline: Instagram的替代品

localize.description: 在Hive上分享內容並與您所愛的人建立聯繫。你可以通過我們可定製的音樂版塊表達自己的想法。我們的探索頁面上有特色內容、熱門標籤和主題列表。你甚至可以轉發、分享和回覆帶有 Gifs 的帖子。
localize.tagline: Instagram的替代品

nodes.excerpt: With UpCount.live you can get your product upvotes counter online. Monitor your Product Hunt launch upvotes count on a big screen or mobile device.
nodes.title: UpCount.live - Watch your Product Hunt launch 🔔
nodes.author: Maxim Manylov

localize.description: 有了UpCount.live，你可以在线获取你的产品上票数。在大屏幕或移动设备上监控您的产品搜索发布的上票数。
localize.tagline: 观看您的猎奇产品发布会 🔔。

localize.tagline: 觀看您的獵奇產品發佈會 🔔。

nodes.excerpt: Studio photography is no longer out of reach. Our full photo crew carefully hires models, designs scenes, and captures moments to offer you the best studio stock photos possible. With this new platform, you can find exactly what you need –or create it!
nodes.title: Moose Photos 3.0 by Icons8 - Free, studio-produced stock photos you can customize

nodes.title: Covid-19 hospitalizations in the US have declined 30 days in a row, down 58k from their peak on Jan 6.  🙏 https://t.co/KilgtigmCT
nodes.author: Charlie Bilello

localize.full_text: 科维德-19在美国的住院人数已经连续30天下降，比1月6日的峰值下降了5.8万。🙏 https://t.co/KilgtigmCT。
科維德-19在美國的住院人數已經連續30天下降，比1月6日的峯值下降了5.8萬。🙏 https://t.co/KilgtigmCT。
